name: Numberline 3
description: Numberline 3 is hard, but very interesting puzzle game, which will force your mind work for all 100%. You relax, play and listen good soundtrack in the beginning, but after a few levels the game becomes difficult and more exciting.
minimum_requirements: Minimale : Système d'exploitation : Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7 Processeur : Intel® Pentium® III or higher Mémoire vive : 512 MB de mémoire Graphiques : 256 MB or higher Espace disque : 150 MB d'espace disque disponible
